titleStmt.title: We judging it requisite for the better government of His Majesties army, and the preservation of the peace of this kingdom, that all officers and souldiers under their command, should be, and continue in their respective garrisons ... by the Lord Lieutenant General and General Governour of Ireland, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1677-1685 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 4 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at His Majesties castle of Dublin in 14th. day of October, 1678. [signed] W: Ellis."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
